Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.client.popup

Class NewWorkspacePopup

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBusPublisher
net.cnoga.paint.client.popup.AbstractInputPopup
net.cnoga.paint.client.popup.NewWorkspacePopup
public class NewWorkspacePopup extends AbstractInputPopup
Popup dialog for creating a new workspace/canvas.

Allows the user to specify width and height for the new workspace. Input is validated to prevent excessively large canvases. Posts a NewWorkspaceRequest on confirmation.
